entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:53 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
